name: SmartPowerGateway
0:
”Alexa, Turn off the Deck Lights”
”Alexa, Turn on the Deck Lights”
”Alexa, dim the Deck Lights to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Smart Power Gateway lets you control your 50 Watt Smart Power Supply via a smart switch style WIFI/BLE gateway. 
It's able to control power and dimming by sending commands to smart switch gateway which relays the commands to the SmartPower 50 transformer.
Will require the purchase of the Smart Power Gateway and a Smart Power 50 Transformer. 
During the setup of Smart Power Gateway, you will login to a captive portal on the Smart Power Gateway (smart switch). Follow the on screen instructions provided by the captive portal to connect your wifi and bluetooth (BLE).
When the captive portal setup is completed by clicking 'Step 3 - Link Account' in the captive portal, you will be sent to our Auth0 site ( https://mqtt.decklighthelp.com/register ) to login to your account or sign up if it is your first login. There is an option to link your Google account as Auth0 instead of signing up for an account. This information is used to link the skill.
